content: big basket it s big we love big home decrease baskets big medium small any size baskets handmade baskets are all so beautiful and functional the pattern is written for the pictured basket size approximately 13 we added gorgeous leather handles to make it complete crochet different sizes with simple modifications to the bottom my cats were also very interested in the basket project but they couldn t have this one i ll just have to make one for each of them enjoy materials one skein of bobbiny jumbo 9mm braiding cord 100% recycled cotton & polyester core 100 meters size q 15 75mm crochet hook smaller size crochet hook for tucking in the ends 8mm h one locking stitch marker yarn needle the bottom of the basket is 13 in diameter 6 tall gauge is 1 st /inch directions bottom of basket using the magic_ring technique sc9 stitches round 1 single_crochet single_crochet into the first single_crochet to connect the round pm place marker single_crochet into that stitch again continue 2sc into each stitch the order of stitches will be 2 2 2 etc to eor 18 stitches round 2 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next stitch *sc2 into next stitch sc1 repeat from * to the end of the round 27 stitches the order of stitches will be 2 1 2 1 etc to eor round 3 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 2 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc2 repeat from * to the end of the round 36 stitches the order of stitches will be 2 1 1 2 1 1 etc to eor round 4 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 3 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc3 repeat from * to the end of the round 45 stitches the order of stitches will be 2 1 1 1 2 1 1 1 etc to eor round 5 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into each stitch to the end of the round bottom ridge remove marker single_crochet into the back of the first stitch replace marker single_crochet into the back leg of each stitch in this round this will create the bottom ridge sides of basket crochet knit stitch rounds 1-6 remove marker cks crochet knit stitch in between the stitches this is not under the two loops of the single_crochet stitch it is cks stitch in between all stitches in the round note the manufacturer s instructions call this a v_stitch however it is a crochet knit stitch this is a very good video demonstrating the stitch we use for the sides of the basket please watch remember to replace the marker at the start of each round finishing cut a 6 tail and secure final stitch create a duplicate stitch with the tail into the marked stitch use a
